entry.title: Optimal Resource Transportation in Graph Network using Min-Cost Flow

link.title: Optimal Resource Transportation in Graph Network using Min-Cost Flow

entry.summary: Constructed a Network Graph using location, trip information adhering to accessibility and business constraints. Used K-Shortest Path Algorithms (Yen’s, Iterative-DFS) to find cost optimal routes based on factors (time, distance, money). Used Network Simplex Algorithm to generate optimal schedule for timely resource availability. Accounted for minimum, maximum safety stock limit and cu...

entry.title: Document Classification, Detail Extraction and Processing

link.title: Document Classification, Detail Extraction and Processing

entry.summary: Classified documents esp. invoices into types using OCR. Extended Chargrid model to Japanese language and additional field detection. Reduced model’s training, inference time and increased accuracy of character detection. Experimented on using named entity recognition for extracting single-word fields in place of annotated approach. Automated sales data entry from documents and cross-v...

entry.title: Covid-19 Optimal Resource Allocation and Relief Request Classification

link.title: Covid-19 Optimal Resource Allocation and Relief Request Classification

entry.summary: Developed for Government of Karanataka. Constructed a graph of supply and demand locations and used Transportation Problem’s algorithmic variants to optimally allocate relief resources. Classified free-text queries into predefined grievance and relief request types (food, medical etc.) for their redressal.

entry.title: Nest on Electric Pole Detection to curb Electricity Outages

link.title: Nest on Electric Pole Detection to curb Electricity Outages

entry.summary: Detected electric poles via InceptionV3 model, developed a custom model to detect nests on already identified poles. Used GAN, Neural Style Transfer and standard image augmentation techniques to compensate for small dataset. Achieved overall training accuracy of 97% and validation and testing accuracy of 95%. Deployed it on cloud.

entry.title: Efficient Cylindrical Pipe Loading in Transportation Vehicle

link.title: Efficient Cylindrical Pipe Loading in Transportation Vehicle

entry.summary: Developed a greedy heuristic solution: proposed a decreasing diametric pipe arrangement, along with telescoping of smaller diameter pipes in larger ones.
